paragraph: Harry remains at his house ,  Privet , living with his Muggle aunt , uncle and cousin and severely cut off from the rest of the wizarding world . The neighbourhood is suffering from an exhausting heat wave and due to this , Harry spends the majority of his summer out of the house , going on walks and trying to avoid his aunt and uncle as much as possible because the paranoid pair wo n't stop badgering him over his interest in the news . He is constantly rummaging through bins for old newspapers , searching for front-page news about the return of Tom in the Daily Prophet .

However , nothing unusual is reported , so Harry assumes that the Minister for Magic , Cornelius is still as oblivious and in denial of Tom 's return as he was before . After running into his cousin , Dudley and his street gang on a walk , Harry confronts Dudley after his gang leaves which turns into an argument , where Dudley mocks Harry about Cedric 's death , having heard Harry use that name in his sleep . Harry immediately denies it and when Harry takes out his wand and pretends to curse Dudley with it ; a cold chill comes onto the duo and Harry and Dudley are then attacked by Dementors .
Harry attempts the Patronus Charm three times and is successful on the last try , and is surprised to find Arabella , his old , cat-loving neighbour , storming up the road towards the two teenagers .
He tries to hide his wand , but she tells him to keep it out in case more of them show up .
She is furious about Mundungus , who was supposed to be watching Harry and Apparition from the front of  Privet only moments earlier .

While angry over the situation , Arabella explains to a surprised Harry she is actually a Squib . The two take a Demented Dudley back to Privet , where Arabella mentions she was sent by Albus to watch over Harry and also kept his visits to her house boring so Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley would not send Harry elsewhere if he were happy . After Mundungus shows up , Arabella scolds him for his foolish actions before sending him to inform Albus of this situation so he can act quickly . Just before they part , Harry learns that Albus has been keeping him under observation in order to protect him after what had happened with Tom last month . When Petunia and Vernon notice Dudley in his sickly state they fawn over him and Harry attempts to slip away , but Dudley speaks and assumes that Harry attacked him with some sort of spell since Muggles can not see Dementors . Before Harry can explain himself , the Ministry of Magic sends Harry a letter telling him that he 's been expelled from Hogwarts for underage magic . Before Harry attempts to run away before Ministry officials would come by to destroy his wand , another letter from Arthur arrives telling Harry that Albus is trying to sort this out and to stay put in his house , not surrender his wand , and not to perform any more magic .

As Harry is explaining that Dementor are responsible , Petunia surprisingly shows she has some knowledge of Dementor . A second letter from the Ministry arrives stating that Albus has convinced them to set up a hearing on  August to decide whether or not to break Harry 's wand and Harry is being placed on suspension instead of being expelled . After Harry explains to Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley about the Dementor 's abilities , Vernon blames Harry and is ready to throw Harry out , as he has always yearned to do so since receiving Harry , when Petunia receives a Howler . Before she has an opportunity to open the letter , it bursts into flames and a menacing voice says , `` Remember my last , Petunia '' . Petunia then immediately convinces her husband to let Harry remain at Privet and tells Harry that he needs to stay in his room .
Harry has no idea of what 's going on .

Harry immediately writes letters to Sirius , Hermione , and Ronald . After four days of being locked in his room , while dealing with his anger from the lack of response , uncle Vernon , Petunia , and Dudley leave to attend an award ceremony for the best kept suburban lawn in England -LRB- which was a hoax set up by Nymphadora to lure Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley away from Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley 's house -RRB- and a number of witches and wizards -LRB- auto denominated the `` Advance '' -RRB- come to rescue Harry from Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley 's home .
Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley are members of the Order of the Phoenix , an elite group whose members fight Tom and the Death .

Among Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley were the real Mad-Eye Moody and Remus , along with some newcomers such as Nymphadora and Kingsley . Remus reveals that Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley 's destination is a hidden place that is much safer than the Burrow .
Remus leaves a note for Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley , then the entire group begins a long flight on broomsticks .
After flying through the cold night , they land at their destination and Moody gives Harry a piece of parchment that mentions their headquarters ,  Grimmauld Place .
They bring Harry to their headquarters ,  Grimmauld Place -LRB- London -RRB- .
The Weasley , Hermione , and Harry 's godfather Sirius are there .
While the Order of the Phoenix are having a meeting , Mrs takes Harry to the room where Ronald and Hermione are before heading back .

Harry converses with Hermione and Ronald and learns to his ire that Albus was the reason he had no contact from his friends all summer , though Ronald and Hermione were uncomfortable with this knowing how Harry would feel . They comfort Harry by explaining that they have n't been let in on everything that has been going on either since they are too young and have mostly been working on cleaning up the house as no one has lived there for years .

Fred and George then appear magically through Apparition , revealing to Harry they passed their test , followed by Ginevra walking into the room and tells the twins it is now pointless for them to spy on the meetings anymore .

The Weasley children reveal that -- besides Severus who has joined the Order -- William and Charles have also joined . Also that William has moved back to England to be closer to Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley and has been teaching the former Triwizard champion Fleur who has also been working at Gringotts in order to improve her English , while Charles has been given the task of recruiting foreign wizards to their cause .

As for Percy , the Weasley children sadly reveal he has deserted Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley 's after he and Arthur had a fight over Percy 's recent promotion to Cornelius 's Junior Assistant .

Having denied his father 's claims that Fudge is using him , with his unwavering loyalty to the Ministry , Percy has moved away , breaking off contact in the process , even after a depressed Molly tried to straighten things out .
Harry also learns that the Ministry has been using the Daily Prophet to build on what Rita started and is portraying Harry as some `` attention-seeking liar '' .

Hermione also reveals there have been no articles on the Dementor attack or Harry 's hearing , since the Ministry is likely waiting until the hearing is over before reporting on the likelihood of Harry being expelled .
After being called down for dinner , Nymphadora accidentally trips on an umbrella stand , which causes too much noise , and the portrait of a woman responds with strong cursing .

While helping on closing the curtains , Sirius shows up and reveals the woman in the portrait is his mother . Sirius explains to Harry that Number  , Grimmauld Place is the Black family 's ancestral home and that he inherited it upon his mother 's death . While they are setting up for dinner , Sirius reveals that compared to Harry , he has been confined in the house for a month since he is still a wanted criminal and that Tom and the Death would know he is an Animagus by now due to Wormtail informing them , which makes him almost useless to the Order .

Fred and George almost stab Sirius ' hand when they send a cauldron of stew , an iron flagon of butterbeer and a breadboard with a knife to the table and the knife slips off , which infuriates their parents , as they have been using their magic irresponsibly ever since they came of age .

They then have dinner , and numerous conversations go around , with William mentioning to his father and Lupin that the goblins wo n't join their side due to what happened with Ludovic , and Mundungus mentioning his business dealings before Molly asks him to stop .

After dinner , Sirius tries to tell Harry about the latest events and about their plans but Molly keeps saying that Harry is too young and that Albus told them not to tell Harry `` more than he needs to know '' . After the two argue about it , Molly reluctantly allows Harry and everyone else but Ginevra to stay and listen .
Harry learns that Tom is keeping a low profile and is building an army .

Though Harry managed to escape during Tom 's rebirth , allowing Albus to reactivate the Order of the Phoenix , it is difficult for them to convince as many people what has happened because of the Ministry and Cornelius 's position , since Cornelius believes that Albus is after Cornelius 's job ; Cornelius 's fears make it easier for Cornelius to believe that , rather than admit Tom is back , which would end the last fourteen years of peace .
Another reason the Order is having trouble with finding allies is the issue of their credibility .

Sirius is a wanted murderer , Remus is a werewolf , and the members that work for the Ministry would lose their jobs since Cornelius is willing to sack anyone just for disagreeing with Cornelius . Fudge has also been trying to discredit Albus 's reputation to prevent Cornelius from spreading the information and is having the Daily Prophet cover up any news related to this . Sirius attempts to mention that Tom is trying to retrieve a `` weapon ... something Cornelius did n't have last time '' , before Molly and Remus ask Cornelius to stop and they then send the kids off to bed .

After Harry and Ronald head into their room , Fred and George apparate inside where the four briefly discuss their speculation on what Tom might be seeking before their mother 's footsteps convince the twins they have to get back to their own room .

The next day while helping with the cleaning of the house with Mrs and the other children , Harry talks in secret with Fred and George and learns their joke shop plans are booming thanks to the money he gave them though they have n't got premises yet and their mother remains unaware of it due to the fact she had cancelled their subscription to the Daily Prophet out of disgust .
While Molly is busy arguing with Mundungus in another room , Harry meets Kreacher , the domestic-elf of the House of Black .

He is always cursing and muttering bad words , on occasion calling Hermione a mudblood and then insulting Sirius for betraying his mother 's trust after Sirius arrives before Kreacher heads to another room .
Harry notices an old tapestry , that Sirius sarcastically explains is the family tree of the `` Noble and Most Ancient House of Black '' .

Sirius reveals that he was disowned by Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley at the age of sixteen and lived with Harry 's father James and his parents before his uncle , who was disowned as well , left Sirius some money to live on his own .
Sirius mentions to Harry that his younger brother Regulus , who was more obedient to their parents ' wishes , had been a Death .

Sirius explains that Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley was all for the purification of the wizarding race , getting rid of Muggle-borns and having pure-bloods in charge , and while not all of them were Death , Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley agreed with Tom 's ideals .
Sirius mentions that his brother was killed , presumably for attempting to abandon the Death .

After Molly calls Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley down for lunch , Harry stays with Sirius and Sirius explains more about Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley .
Harry is then surprised to learn that Sirius is related to Draco-Lucius-Narcissa through Lucius 's wife Narcissa .
He also learns that Nymphadora ' mother Andromeda is Sirius 's cousin and that she was also disowned .
Both she and Narcissa had a sister , Bellatrix , who was sent to Azkaban .
She is the woman Harry saw in Albus 's Pensieve during Bartemius 's trial .

Sirius then mentions his parents ' home is only being used as the Order of the Phoenix 's headquarters due to the protective enchantments his father put on it years ago and the additional security measures that Albus set up , which is why he had to put up with moving back in .

After several more days of cleaning , on the night before Harry 's hearing , Molly mentions that Arthur will be escorting him to the Ministry on his way to work . The next day , Harry heads down to breakfast and learns that Amelia Bones will be in charge of his hearing , and Nymphadora assures him that she is fair . Sirius reminds Harry not to lose his temper during the hearing . Harry is nervous over the possibility of being expelled from Hogwarts , but Remus assures Harry that underage wizards are allowed to use magic in life-threatening situations . Arthur then escorts Harry to the Ministry for his disciplinary hearing using the train in the London Underground to get there -LRB- since Harry ca n't Apparate -RRB- .

After spending time on the lift getting to the Department of Magical Law Enforcement and then putting on an act with Kingsley about Sirius -LRB- due to the need to keep their affiliation secret -RRB- . Shortly after arriving in Mr 's office , Mr 's co-worker , Perkins , runs in announcing that the hearing 's time and location has been changed , and Harry is already late .
The new location is in old Courtroom Ten in the Ministry 's basement .

Since the lift does not descend that far , Harry and Mr race down the stairs the rest of the way after getting off . Just outside the courtroom , Mr stops , telling Harry that he must face the hearing alone .
Harry recognises the courtroom is the same one he saw in Albus 's Pensieve during his last school year .
Cornelius is acting as the head of the Wizengamot , and Harry is also surprised to see Percy acting as scribe , although Percy refuses to look at Harry .
After Albus arrives , Fudge starts the trial without giving Harry a chance to defend himself .

Once Harry gets Dementor Dementor , Cornelius labels his statement a convenient lie , but Albus is able to produce a reliable witness : Arabella , whom Percy brings in . Arabella is able to describe the attack and confirms that Dementor attacked Harry and Dudley .
When Cornelius points out the unlikelihood of Dementors in Little Whinging , Dumbledore suggests that someone within the Ministry ordered them there .
Fudge however , refuses to accept any of this as evidence and while Albus reminds him that magic can be used in these extraordinary circumstances .
Fudge dismisses this , given Harry 's past issues , reminding them of the illegal use of a Hover Charm three years ago .
While this was Dobby 's fault , Fudge refuses Albus 's suggestion to bring Dobby in and also brings up the fact that Harry inflated Dobby 's aunt a year later , even though no charges were pressed .
Fudge also tries to bring up Harry 's rule-breaking at Hogwarts , but Albus reminds Cornelius that the Ministry does not have the authority to punish students for what they do at school .

He points out the irregularity of the hastiness for this trial and attempt to destroy Harry 's wand without successfully proving these charges and also the use of the full Wizengamot for a simple case of under-age magic .

When the Wizengamot takes a vote , Harry is cleared of all charges with more than half of the Wizengamot raising their hands to clear him , though Cornelius is slightly angry when he casts the verdict . Albus leaves before Harry can thank him . Harry is puzzled by Albus 's actions before Albus leaves the courtroom and tells Mr , who was waiting outside , that Albus had been cleared of all charges . Mr is surprised that Harry was tried before the entire Wizengamot , as they are also leaving the courtroom , with some showing them recognition , while others , like Cornelius and Percy , completely ignore them . Arthur decides to take Harry back to Grimmauld Place before Albus heads out on an assignment .
On their way they see Cornelius meeting with Lucius .
While Harry believes that Cornelius may have been put under the Imperius , Mr states that Albus has doubted this , believing Cornelius is acting of Albus 's own accord .
Back at Grimmauld Place , everybody celebrates Harry 's acquittal .
A few days later , on the last day of the holidays , the children receive Hogwarts and Ronald and Hermione are named prefects .

Molly is so pleased with Ronald 's appointment as a prefect that she agrees to Ronald 's request to get a new broomstick -LRB- though an inexpensive one -RRB- when she goes to Diagon to pick up their new books .
Harry feels some resentment that Ronald was chosen over him as prefect , given all he has done at Hogwarts over the years .

Later that night , Mrs prepares a dinner party for the new prefects . During the party , Harry feels better when he learns from Sirius that he and Harry 's father James were not made prefects either during their fifth year at Hogwarts , since Remus was selected for that position instead .
After the party , Mrs goes upstairs to get rid of the Boggart identified for her earlier .

Moody shows Harry an old photograph of the original Order of the Phoenix and identifies the people in the photograph , though hearing Moody describe the terrible fates of some of the members in the photograph makes Harry feel uncomfortable .

After going upstairs , Harry finds that the sight of her worst fears -LRB- all her family members and Harry dead -RRB- was too much for Mrs ; she started to cry before Remus gets rid of the Boggart after arriving upstairs with Sirius and Moody . As they help calm her down , Mrs wonders about the future of her loved ones .
On the day of departure to Platform Nine and Three-Quarters , the group is rushing to get ready as the children will be taken there under guard per Moody 's recommendation .
Mrs is angry with Fred and George for bewitching their trunks instead of trying to carry them downstairs and knocking Ginevra off-balance .
Harry is assigned to go with Molly and Nymphadora .
Sirius accompanies them in his Animagus form .

After the Hogwarts departs , with Ronald and Hermione having to go to the prefects ' carriage , Harry shares a compartment with Ginevra , Neville , and a girl from Ginevra 's year named Luna , who is a Ravenclaw student . Later Ronald and Hermione show up and tell them who the new prefects are for the other houses , including Draco and Pansy for Slytherin . Luna is reading a tabloid magazine called The Quibbler , of which , she tells them , her father is the editor , after Hermione makes an insensitive comment towards the magazine . Draco and his cronies then show up briefly and Draco makes fun of the fact that Ronald was chosen over Harry for the position of prefect and his comment `` dogging around '' causes Harry to worry that Draco might know now that Sirius is an Animagus .

After arriving at Hogsmeade station Harry notices that instead of Rubeus , Professor Grubbly-Plank , who previously substituted for Rubeus during their last school year , is there to direct the first years to their boats .
When boarding their carriage Harry notices that the carriages are being pulled by some sort of winged horses .

He points them out to Ronald and Hermione , but they can not see them , and act worried when he insists that they are right there . Luna says that she can see them , and in fact could see them ever since she first came to Hogwarts . Harry is mystified , since he could n't see them when he first came , but he can see them now .
The group arrives at the school , but not before Harry wonders about the winged horses , as well as Rubeus 's whereabouts . Ronald gets into an argument with Luna over Rubeus 's disappearance .
At the Start-of-Term Feast , the Sorting Hat gives a warning in its new song .

After their meal , the students are surprised to hear that Dolores , Senior Undersecretary to the Minister -LRB- who had been present at Harry 's hearing -RRB- is the new Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher -LRB- besides the announcement that Grubbly-Plank is once again taking over Rubeus 's teaching duties -RRB- .

Dolores rudely interrupts Albus 's start-of-term notices and gives a speech which easily dulls the audience and Hermione realises through the hidden messages within the speech that the Ministry intends to meddle at Hogwarts .
After the feast , Harry goes to Gryffindor with Neville -LRB- who knew the new password -RRB- and when he goes to his dormitory , learns that not everyone believes that Tom is back .

He argues with Seamus and insults Seamus 's mother for believing in the Daily Prophet , before Ronald arrives and breaks it up . Afterwards , Dean reveals his mother does n't get the Prophet since she 's a Muggle , while Neville reveals that he and his grandmother cancelled their subscription since they support Harry and Albus .
Before going to sleep , Harry wonders how many fights he will have to have before people realise that Tom is truly back .

The next morning the trio meet in the common room and , after taking down one of Fred and George 's advertising posters , Hermione learns of the argument with Seamus and reveals that she was having the same problem with Lavender about whether Harry was telling the truth about Tom 's return .

That morning at breakfast , Harry learns from Angelina that she has replaced Oliver as the captain for their Quidditch team and will be holding tryouts on Friday to recruit a new player to fill Oliver 's old position as Keeper .

Harry reveals that he has cancelled his subscription to the Daily Prophet out of disgust.The trio then meet with Fred and George and Hermione insists they can not advertise to test their joke products on students .

The twins bring up the fact that this year is important for the three of them since they will be taking their O.W.L.s. . When the twins reveal they were n't sure if they wanted to attend their seventh year for their N.E.W.T.s , George almost lets it slip on why they do n't need to take them , though they and Harry cover this up as the twins leave .

Ronald then remembers that besides their O.W.L.s , they will also have Career Advice sessions to help determine what classes they 'll need to take next year for their N.E.W.T.s on what career they 'll pursue .
After going through most of their classes and getting a lot of homework , as well as Harry briefly meeting up with Cho , they head to their first Defence Against the Dark Arts lesson .

There they discover that Dolores refuses to teach real defence methods and that they will not be performing any spells , only learning Ministry-approved theory -LRB- learning in a `` risk-free way '' -RRB- .

When various students start raising questions regarding this , Dolores immediately contradicts them and also criticises the teachings of their previous two teachers , including identifying Remus as a `` dangerous half-breed '' .

Harry disagrees with Dolores about Tom , costing Gryffindor house points and getting him a detention . Harry then has an outburst after she rebuts his attempts to convince her that this is not a lie and sends Harry to Minerva 's office with a note . Upon learning what happened , Minerva urges Harry to keep his temper under control because he could end up in even worse trouble due to Dolores 's position .
Minerva then reveals the note Dolores sent to her states that Dolores has assigned him detention for a week .
Word quickly spreads amongst the students about Harry 's behaviour in Dolores 's class that night at dinner , creating more snide remarks .

After they leave the Great , Hermione explains to an irritated Harry that despite Albus 's speech at the end of the last school term about Tom 's return , the Ministry 's interference over the last two months prevented the truth from sinking in .
When they return to their common room , the trio talk about Dolores and her class .
Hermione points out Dolores was obviously sent by Fudge as a spy .

When the other students return from dinner , Hermione catches Fred and George once again testing their joke products on first year students . Though Fred and George mean no harm , as they tested their products on themselves first , Hermione threatens to write to their mother if they continue to test them on first years .
Hermione then goes to bed and also mentions the woolly hats she brought are for the house-elves , confirming she is still doing her S.P.E.W. work .
The next day , teachers brief their fifth year students about their upcoming Ordinary Wizarding Level exams and give them a lot of homework .
Rubeus is still missing , and his class is taken over by Professor Grubbly-Plank .

During Care of Magical Creatures , Harry has difficulty keeping his temper under control when he hears Draco make some rude comments about Rubeus , including that it is likely that Rubeus will be sacked even if he did return to Hogwarts based on what his father told him .

Once he returns to Hogwarts , Angelina mentions to Harry that she is unhappy that Harry 's detention on Friday will prevent from attending the tryouts for their Quidditch team , as she wanted the whole team to be there . Due to Harry 's telling the truth about Tom 's return in Dolores 's first Defence Against the Dark Arts lesson , she gives him detention every day for a week . Dolores refuses Harry 's suggestion to modify the punishment so he could attend Quidditch tryouts on Friday , believing it is the most effective punishment to make him miss out on something he likes .
She makes him write out `` I must not tell lies '' many times in his own blood , though Harry makes sure to keep his temper under control to avoid another outburst in front of Dolores .
With Dolores 's detentions and his busy schedule , Harry has difficulty with keeping up on his homework . Ronald is busy with something , causing him to also fall behind in his homework .
He later mentions to Harry that he wants to try out for the Quidditch team now that he has a decent broom .

Ronald becomes concerned when he learns about Harry 's detentions , but Harry refuses to go to Minerva or Albus , knowing there is nothing they can do . After Harry 's final detention on Friday , he learns that Ronald was chosen as their team 's new Keeper .
Angelina also apologises for the cold way she criticised Harry earlier , due to the pressure of having to lead their Quidditch team .
He then meets with Hermione who is exhausted after making more hats for the house-elves .
When Harry mentions his scar recently hurting again , he refuses her advice to see Albus .

Harry decides to immediately write to Sirius , but Hermione talks him out of it by pointing out the chances his letter could be intercepted . On Saturday morning , despite Hermione 's warning , Harry decides to write a letter to Sirius . Harry writes about his detention and asks about Rubeus 's whereabouts , though he carefully codes the words and phrases in case the letter is intercepted .

After sending Hedwig with the letter , Harry notices the same mysterious winged horses he saw before outside . Cho arrives and praises Harry for standing up to Dolores in her class , before Argus arrives . He claims that he heard from a source that Harry was sending an order for Dungbombs , but Harry states that he already sent his letter , which Cho confirms .
After Harry arrives at breakfast , Hermione reads through the Daily Prophet .

She discovers that the Ministry has received a tip that Sirius is hiding in London . Harry worries that Lucius may be the source , as he may have recognised Sirius in his Animagus form at King 's Cross Station .
Harry also notices an article saying that Sturgis , secretly a member of the Order of the Phoenix , has been arrested for breaking into a top secret room at the Ministry .
This causes some concern , as Harry recalls that Podmore did not show up for guard duty on the day they left for Platform Nine and Three-Quarters .

Harry then helps Ronald practise before their actual Quidditch training session begins . During the training session , Draco and his gang are there to insult the members of the Gryffindor team , and a nervous Ronald is n't able to play at his best .
When an accident Ronald caused injures Katie 's nose , which Fred unintentionally makes worse , Katie has to be taken to the Hospital Wing .
The remainder of the training session is then called off .
After he and Harry spend the next day trying to catch up on homework , on Sunday evening , Ronald receives a letter from Percy .

His brother congratulates him on becoming a prefect and urges him to stop associating with Harry , whom he feels is a bad influence , as well as believing that Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley would one day realise Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley 's mistake for believing Albus and apologise to him .
He also mentions an important article is being released in the Daily Prophet tomorrow .

Ronald finds the letter extremely offensive , tears it up and throws it into the fire . After reading the letter , Harry thought he had never felt more like his godfather Sirius , whom the wizarding world at large still considered a mass murderer .
Hermione then agrees to help Harry and Ronald catch up on their homework . After midnight , they and Crookshanks are the only ones left in the Common Room .
Sirius contacts them through the Floo , as he wishes to respond to Harry 's letter this way in case his response was intercepted and the code was broken .
After talking about Harry 's scar , Sirius mentions that while Dolores is no Death Eater , she possesses a strong racial hatred for half-breeds .
Sirius reveals she is the reason why Remus can not find a job due to anti-werewolf legislation she proposed in the Ministry .
Once the trio mentions Dolores 's classes only allow defensive theory and textbook reading , Sirius explains based on their information , Fudge does not want them trained in combat .

Fudge believes Albus intends to use the Defence Against the Dark Arts class to raise the students as an army to take on the Ministry , and wants to prevent this possibility with the new curriculum . Sirius knows that with Fudge 's growing paranoia , it is only a matter of time before he finds an excuse to arrest Albus .

Sirius then asks Harry not to worry about Rubeus . Sirius reveals while Olympe mentioned in her message they got separated on the way home , he knows Rubeus 's tough and asks Harry not to raise too many questions about Rubeus or they will attract the Ministry 's attention .

When Sirius suggests about meeting them in disguise at their next Hogsmeade trip , Harry advises him not to given the Daily Prophet article and that Draco might recognise him if Sirius were to show up .
Sirius then leaves , but mentions he will send a letter when he feels it is safe to communicate by the Floo again .

It becomes clear Dolores is really there to spy on and take control of the school , and is soon appointed High Inquisitor , arbitrarily imposing rules and regulations -LRB- known as `` Educational Decrees '' -RRB- .
She also harbours racial hatred for `` half-breeds '' , such as centaurs , werewolves and similar creatures .
Umbridge starts to observe the professors in class , where she apparently intends to evaluate all teachers .
Hermione convinces Harry to secretly teach students Defence Against the Dark Arts .
Though at first reluctant , Harry finally accepts .

They hold a meeting at the Hog 's Head to discuss with other students the possibility of Harry giving them Defence lessons . Harry is stunned at how many there are : Neville , Dean , Lavender , Parvati and Padma , Cho and her friend whom Harry did not recognise , Luna , Katie , Alicia , Angelina , Colin and Dennis , Ernest , Justin Finch-Fletchley , Hannah , Susan , Anthony , Michael Corner , Terry , Ginevra , a Hufflepuff team member -LRB- later identified as Zacharias -RRB- , Fred and George , and Lee .
Harry has only agreed to teach defensive magic .
At the end of the meeting Hermione has everyone sign a piece of parchment , which is an agreement to keep the group secret .

After hearing about the defensive magic organisation , Dolores used her power as Hogwarts to pass this Educational Decree , which immediately disbands all existing clubs , teams , societies and groups and forbids further groups -LRB- defined as ` the regular meeting of three or more students ' -RRB- without the High Inquisitor 's consent .
Any student found to be in noncompliance of the Decree was to be expelled immediately .

Harry worries that someone from the Hog 's Head group might have betrayed them , but Hermione informs him that Hermione enchanted the parchment they all signed to inform Hermione 's if someone did . Harry also learns from Angelina that Gryffindor-Slytherin-Ravenclaw-Irish-Bulgarian have also been disbanded under the new decree -LRB- although Dolores unsurprisingly immediately gives the Slytherin team permission to reform -RRB- and asks Harry to promise Hermione not to provoke Dolores again out of fear Hermione might not reinstate the Gryffindor team . Despite the prohibition , they name their clandestine group `` Albus 's Army '' , or the D.A. for short , to mock the Ministry of Magic , which fears Albus is creating a secret wizard army .
Harry assured all the  members that the meetings would go ahead once an ideal location was found .
They would just need to be careful .
Soon , Harry was told about the Room of Requirement by the house-elf Dobby .
For the safety of the group , Hermione bewitched some coins with a Protean Charm , one for each member of the D.A. .
When activated by Harry , the numbers on each coin would change to inform the bearer of the time and date of the next meeting .
In the D.A. meetings , Harry started them off slowly , practising the Disarming Charm .
The class progressed at a fair rate , practising the Impediment Jinx , the Reductor , and the Stunning Spell .
The Gryffindor team began their season with a victory against Slytherin , despite the fact that Ronald was very nervous and did n't play well .
Slytherin-Salazar composed a song mocking Salazar 's performance .
Shortly after the match , Draco insulted and provoked Fred and George and Harry .
Harry and George attacked him , but all three had their broomsticks confiscated and were given lifetime bans by Dolores .
They were replaced by Andrew , Jack , and Ginevra , respectively .

That night , they discover that Rubeus had returned home . Rubeus returned from his mission for Albus badly injured . Harry , Ronald and Hermione visit him and Rubeus tells them about his unlucky negotiations with the giants . They learn that the Death Eaters were also trying to recruit them , and he was unsuccessful in trying to convince the giants to help the Order .
Hagrid resumes his teaching post , beginning with a lesson about Thestral , the mysterious winged horses only Harry could see .
Harry learns that only people who have witnessed death are able to see them .
Hagrid returns to his class and he is observed by Dolores while teaching about Thestral .
Harry is expelled from Quidditch by Dolores and Ginevra replaces him as Gryffindor 's Seeker .
Harry has disturbing dreams about running down a hallway and attempting to open a door in the Ministry of Magic 's Department of Mysteries , but being unable to do so .
Then one night he dreams that he is a snake attacking Ronald 's father .
He awakens in a panic and tells others , who indeed find Mr at the Ministry , suffering from severe venomous snake bites .
Critically injured , Arthur was taken to St Mungo 's .
He survived the attack , but was required to take a Blood-Replenishing Potion at regular intervals .

He shared the ward with a man who had been bitten by a werewolf and a woman with a massive chunk out of her leg who refused to tell the Healers what had bitten her , arousing suspicions she had been handling something illegal .
Hermione joins Harry and the Weasley at Grimmauld Place for Christmas , and Percy sends back his Weasley jumper , which makes his mother very sad .
Hermione , Ronald and Ginevra discover that Neville 's parents are insane and living at St Mungo 's Hospital for Magical Maladies and Injuries .
They also see their former Defence Against the Dark Arts professor Gilderoy .

Harry finally says that he knew what happened to Neville 's parents . After the holidays , Harry and the Weasley return to Hogwarts . Harry fears he is being possessed by Tom . In response , Albus has Severus teach Harry to block his mind from intrusion .
During the class Harry sees the dark corridor in the Department of Mysteries that he often dreams about .

Due to the high number of students who are sceptical of Tom 's return , Hermione blackmails journalist -LRB- and unregistered Animagus -RRB- Rita into writing a favourable article about Harry witnessing Tom 's return .
Luna arranges with her father to publish the story in his paper , The Quibbler .

Furious , Dolores bans the tabloid from the school and strips Harry of his Hogsmeade visitation rights , but the story spreads rapidly , gathering support for Harry . Many in the wizarding community also now begin to believe Harry .
Dolores considers Rubeus -LRB- a half-giant -RRB- and Sybill incompetent , and sacks Trelawney .

Although Dumbledore is unable to prevent Trelawney 's dismissal , he invokes his authority to allow her to remain in the castle and appoints a new Divination teacher - a centaur , Firenze , much to Dolores 's disgust , due to her hatred for half-breeds . When Dolores learns of the meetings of the DA through Cho 's friend Marietta , Albus claims that he organised it . Confronted by two Aurors John Dawlish and Kingsley -LRB- who was not loyal to the Ministry , but to Albus -RRB- , Cornelius , and Dolores , Albus easily disables them and is spectacularly whisked away by his phoenix , Fawkes . Dolores is appointed Headmistress and imposes even tighter control . Fed up , the Weasley twins instigate a revolt , causing mayhem throughout the school while the staff pointedly do nothing to help Dolores regain control .

During one of the Occlumency lessons Harry uncovered the source behind Severus 's hatred for Severus 's father , when Severus went into Albus 's Pensieve -LRB- borrowed by Snape -RRB- and saw both Severus 's memories of being bullied by James and the breaking up of Severus and Severus 's mother 's friendship .
Snape ended the lesson abruptly after this .
Harry and the other fifth years are getting ready to begin the sessions on the advice of what they 'll need to do to prepare for the careers they 'll pursue after graduation .

Before that , Harry wishes to learn more about what happened at Hogwarts during his father 's time and decides to contact Sirius and Remus at Grimmauld Place to talk about their treatment of Severus .

After going through an interrogation with Dolores regarding Albus and Sirius 's whereabouts , Harry learns the Floo connection in her fireplace is not being monitored like the others are by the Ministry . Under Fred and George 's advice , Harry decides to sneak into Dolores 's office and use her fireplace while they 'll distract her .
Harry is able to talk with Lupin and Sirius a bit before he has to pull back due to the twins being caught .
This marks the end of Fred and George 's magical education , who now opt to move into their magical tricks and joke shop in Diagon , Weasley ' Wizard Wheezes and fly away from Hogwarts .
During Harry 's career advice session with Minerva , he tells her that he wants to be an Auror .
Suddenly they are rudely interrupted by the headmistress , Dolores ; she remarks against Harry 's ambition of being an Auror .
The meeting ends up with Minerva supporting Harry , and having a screaming argument with Dolores .
Fred and George 's departure from Hogwarts triggers a revolt among the students .

During this , Harry finally reveals that he gave them his Triwizard winnings , which is how they got the money to buy everything they need . As Ronald is playing in Gryffindor 's championship Quidditch match , Harry and Hermione are whisked away by Rubeus to introduce his half-brother Grawp . Reasoning that it is only a matter of time before he is driven out of Hogwarts by Dolores now that Albus is gone , Rubeus wants them to take care of Grawp in his stead once this happens . When the centaurs show up , Harry and Hermione learn that Firenze becoming the Divination teacher and Grawp 's presence in the Forbidden have angered them .
The centaurs make it clear to Rubeus that their patience is running thin to where they would n't hesitate to attack any human that enters their forest .
Harry and his fellow fifth years begin going through their O.W.L. examinations .
During the night , Umbridge orders several Aurors to evict Rubeus from Hogwarts .
She acts , this time , under the cover of darkness to avoid what happened with Sybill .
Rubeus resists their spells and Minerva is injured when protesting against the use of excessive force against Rubeus . Rubeus is able to escape and Minerva is sent to St Mungo 's .

Harry receives a vision that Sirius is being tortured at the Department of Mysteries , although Hermione suspects it may be a trap . Harry desperately attempts to contact Sirius at Grimmauld Place via the Floo in Dolores 's office fireplace once again , but this time he is caught . Dolores reveals it was she who sent Dementor to attack Harry during the summer . When Severus enters the interrogation , Harry tries to pass on a coded message to Severus , but is unsure if he understands or intends to deliver it .

After Severus leaves , Dolores is about to use the Cruciatus Curse on Harry until Hermione claims that Albus has hidden a powerful weapon in the Forbidden . She leads Harry and Dolores into the forest , where they encounter centaurs . The Skirmish in the Forbidden ensues , and Dolores foolishly insults them and an angry centaur picks up Dolores and carries her off screaming into the woods .

When Rubeus 's giant half-brother , Grawp crashes onto the scene , Hermione and Harry escape amid the chaos . Harry , Ronald and Hermione , along with Luna , Ginevra and Neville fly to the Ministry of Magic on Thestral , unaware they are being lured into a trap . When they arrive at the Department of Mysteries , they are ambushed by Death . Tom seeks a prophecy contained in a glass sphere there and needs Harry to retrieve it for him . All of the six students heroically fight the many Death , but they are dangerously outmatched .
The group is nearly defeated , but Order members suddenly arrive to help them .
During the ensuing battle , the glass sphere is shattered and the prophecy lost .

Sirius is blasted with a spell by his Death cousin , Bellatrix , and falling backwards , disappears through a mysterious veiled archway . Remus restrains Harry , who wants to follow and rescue Sirius , telling him that Sirius is dead .
Albus arrives and the Death , except for Bellatrix , are captured .
Tom appears and duels with Dumbledore . After fighting the old hero to a stalemate , he attempts to possess Harry in the hope that Albus will kill Harry , seeking to drive Tom out .
However , Harry is too full of grief for the death of Sirius , or love , and Tom can not reside in Harry 's soul without suffering unendurable pain .
Ministry of Magic employees arrive in time to see the Dark Lord before he disapparates , taking Bellatrix with him .
Cornelius finally admits Tom has returned and Harry 's interview with Rita is reprinted in the Daily Prophet .
Later , Albus apologises to Harry for withholding information over the past year .
He reveals the lost prophecy , for it was to him that it was first told :

Albus also reveals that , due to when the boy was predicted to be born , Neville could also have been the child in the prophecy .Albus believes Tom chose to attack Harry because he is a half-blood like himself ; Neville is a pureblood . In doing so , the Dark Lord marked Harry as his equal ; therefore , there is no doubt that the prophecy relates to anyone but Harry .

Albus also reveals to Harry that he never chose him as a prefect because Albus thought that Harry `` had enough responsibility to be going on with . '' While packing , Harry sees the two-way mirror that Sirius gave him , and tries to call his godfather , but he sees nothing . Then suddenly he has the idea to talk to Nearly Headless Nick , and ask him if Sirius could come back as a ghost . Nick says that Sirius is not the kind of wizard who would do that , which leaves Harry disappointed and sad . Later , at King 's Cross Station , Harry is surprised to find that Mad-Eye Moody , Nymphadora and Remus are there to greet him and to ask Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley to treat him better this summer .
Ronald and Hermione say goodbye to Harry with the promise that they will meet very soon .
